title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The maximum Growth rate 3.28 is found at Month Sep '17 and the minimum is found at Nov '17 where Month is 0.1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Growth rate in the y axis.
The Growth rate is highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
Month Aug '17 has the second highest value for Growth rate.
There is a difference of 3.18 between the maximum Month Sep '17 and minimum Month Nov '17.
Growth rate at Month Sep '17 is 3.28 , second place is Aug '17 at 0.82, and thirdly is Dec '17 at 0.61.
The Growth rate has climbed over the past 5 Months.
Similar Growth rate is found in Month Nov '17, and Oct '17.
The Month Nov '17 tends to be 3.34 percent lower than average.
The Growth rate is 4.91 if we add up values of all Months.
